# Global Resorce Use Research Group (GRU)

The overarch aim of GRU is to quantifying society's use of natural resources and its impacts globally

### Develop methods and data for the spatially explicit assessment of resource flows

- Global Material Flows Database url(https://www.resourcepanel.org/global-material-flows-database)

- Global mining land use url(https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-022-01547-4)

- Food and Agriculture Biomass Input-Output Database (FABIO) url(https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acs.est.9b03554)

### State-of-the-art visualization tools to support UN SDGs monitoring 

- Material flow Analysis Portal url(www.materialflows.net) 

- Sustainable Consumption and Production Hotspot Analysis Tool (SCP-HAT) url(http://scp-hat.lifecycleinitiative.org/)

- FINEPRINT geospatial data portal url(https://www.fineprint.global/visualisations)

- And more url(https://www.fineprint.global)
